definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

sentences.english: The Omani people have all along held profound feelings towards the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 阿曼人民對中國人民一向有着深情厚誼。

sentences.english: It is hard for me to respond the profound friendship of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 對中國人民的深情厚誼，我無以回報。

sentences.english: Our deep friendship has lasted for years.
I thank all of you for what you have done for me.
sentences.chinese: 我很感激各人的一番厚誼。

sentences.english: I dedicate this book to Ellen for her unconditional support and friendship.
sentences.chinese: 謹以此書獻給艾倫，感謝她的深情厚誼和無私幫助。
